OOC: How and when Foxfingers left came in the base?

Shivah/Luzbel/Attilla:

Shivah typed some buttons and Panzer's reprogramation processs begun. 
After that he opened his com link and said to Lunarpine "That sort of 
mistakes are mortal, Lunarpine, and your friend should learn to let 
the dragon alone in his shire; this is the trade to give you back 
your friends and Silverscout. I like to exchange Silverscout by the 
antivirus and your two insolent friends by weapons... YOu have five 
minutes to think about and don't leave the area, if you do it I'll 
kill the three bots!!"

Shivah turn off his comm link to Lunarpine and open other frecuency 
to Blaze "Blaze are you in the lab as I commanded you?"

Also Shivah Opened comm link with BUllet, "Bullet the fun is here I 
have an intruder close of me, come here strong-boy, you can kill this 
bot if you like" after that he close his comm link and 
shouted "Luzbel, atttilla" commanded Shivah "Capture that insolent-
bot in this instant while I end the reprogramation process"


Attilla and Luzbel took their dart-sleep-guns and fired agaisnt 
Foxfingers while the internal defences appeared and was ready to 
fight.
